items.title: Introducing Microsoft Marketplace — Thousands of solutions. Millions of customers. One Marketplace. - The Official Microsoft Blog
items.content_text: A new breed of industry-leading company is taking shape — Frontier Firms. These organizations blend human ambition with AI-powered technology to reshape how innovation is scaled, work is orchestrated and value is created. They’re accelerating AI transformation to enrich employee experiences, reinvent customer engagement, reshape business processes and unlock creativity and innovation. To empower customers...

items.title: Canada Goes All In on AI: NVIDIA Joins Nations’ Technology Leaders in Montreal to Shape Sovereign AI Strategy
items.content_text: NVIDIA’s Kari Briski joins Canada’s AI Minister Evan Solomon and Cohere’s Aidan Gomez in a panel this week, as TELUS unveils Canada’s first fully sovereign AI factory in Rimouski and RBC Capital Markets creates AI agents for financial services.

items.title: NVIDIA, OpenAI Announce 'the Biggest AI Infrastructure Deployment in History'
items.content_text: OpenAI and NVIDIA announced a partnership that will scale OpenAI’s compute with at least 10 gigawatts of data centers powered by millions of GPUs.

items.title: The UK’s ‘Goldilocks Moment for AI’: NVIDIA, UK and US Leaders Highlight AI Infrastructure Investments
items.content_text: NVIDIA founder and CEO Jensen Huang discussed the UK’s plans to become an AI superpower with UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer, UK Secretary of State for Science, Innovation and Technology Liz Kendall, UK Secretary of State for Business and Trade Peter Kyle, and US Secretary of Commerce Howard Lutnick.

items.title: Inside the world’s most powerful AI datacenter - The Official Microsoft Blog
items.content_text: This week we have introduced a wave of purpose-built datacenters and infrastructure investments we are making around the world to support the global adoption of cutting-edge AI workloads and cloud services. Today in Wisconsin we introduced Fairwater, our newest US AI datacenter, the largest and most sophisticated AI factory we’ve built yet. In addition to...

items.title: Microsoft leads shift beyond data unification to organization, delivering next-gen AI readiness with new Microsoft Fabric capabilities - The Official Microsoft Blog
items.content_text: We’re in a hinge moment for AI. The experiments are over and the real work has begun. Centralizing data, once the finish line, is now the starting point. The definition of “AI readiness” is evolving as increasingly sophisticated agents demand rich, contextualized data grounded in business operations to deliver meaningful results. What sets leaders apart...

items.title: Score big with Prime for Young Adults—Amazon’s discounted Prime membership
items.content_text: Learn about the extraordinary value of the go-to Prime membership for 18-to-24-year-olds. Eligible new members can try it for six months for $0 and earn 5% cash back.

items.title: AlphaQubit tackles one of quantum computing’s biggest challenges
items.content_text: AlphaQubit is an AI-based decoder that identifies quantum computing errors with state-of-the-art accuracy.

items.title: How to sign up for a free trial of Prime before Prime Big Deal Days 2025
items.content_text: Prime is packed with tons of great benefits—and you can start enjoying them for free today and ahead of Prime Big Deal Days this October.

items.content_text: Lightning Deals are limited-time promotions that offer big savings on some of your favorite brands and products.

items.content_text: It’s not just about free shipping and Prime Video. Prime keeps money back in your pocket.

items.title: Here’s how much a Prime membership costs, and how to make the most of its benefits in time for Prime Big Deal Days this October
items.content_text: Amazon Prime makes your life more convenient, simple, and fun, while saving you money every single day and during events like Prime Big Deal Days.

items.title: NVIDIA Accelerates Robotics Research and Development With New Open Models and Simulation Libraries
items.content_text: NVIDIA today announced that the open‑source Newton Physics Engine is now available in NVIDIA Isaac™ Lab, along with the open NVIDIA Isaac GR00T N1.6 reasoning vision language action model for robot skills and new AI infrastructure.

items.title: OpenAI and NVIDIA Announce Strategic Partnership to Deploy 10 Gigawatts of NVIDIA Systems
items.content_text: OpenAI and NVIDIA today announced a letter of intent for a landmark strategic partnership to deploy at least 10 gigawatts of NVIDIA systems for OpenAI’s next-generation AI infrastructure to train and run its next generation of models on the path to deploying superintelligence.

items.title: A catalogue of genetic mutations to help pinpoint the cause of diseases

New AI tool classifies the effects of 71 million ‘missense’ mutations 
Uncovering the root causes of disease is one of the greatest challenges in human genetics. With millions of possible...

items.title: AlphaProteo generates novel proteins for biology and health research
items.content_text: New AI system designs proteins that successfully bind to target molecules, with potential for advancing drug design, disease understanding and more.

items.title: AlphaEvolve: A Gemini-powered coding agent for designing advanced algorithms

items.title: Florida Investment Matches Our Ambitious Growth Plans | Blue Origin
items.content_text: Blue Origin employs nearly 4,000 people in Brevard County and has invested over $2.3 billion with 500 suppliers in Florida, generating significant economic growth and employment in the region.

items.title: Blue Origin Completes 35th New Shepard Mission | Blue Origin
items.content_text: Blue Origin successfully completed its 35th New Shepard flight and 15th payload mission today from Launch Site One in West Texas.

items.title: Blue Alchemist Hits Major Milestone Toward Permanent and Sustainable Lunar Infrastructure | Blue Origin
items.content_text: Blue Origin's pioneering in-space resource utilization system, Blue Alchemist, has successfully completed its Critical Design Review, marking a transformative milestone toward humanity's permanent expansion beyond Earth.

items.title: The Mission: Blue Origin’s Mars Telecommunications Orbiter | Blue Origin
items.content_text: Built upon our existing and affordable Blue Ring platform, our Mars Telecommunications Orbiter is ready to support NASA’s Mars mission in 2028.
